name: Ripple
body:
# Ripple
## Making Waves
Ripple is a social networking site for both artists and those who love them. It's not just about enjoying music, it's about keeping a finger on the pulse of your local music scene and being an integral part of the ever-changing topography of the music industry.

## Functional Specification Document
Because our website is a living organism, so is our design document. You can check it out with google docs and take note of any comments or concerns you may have about our project:

[Function Specification Document](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nje8pGN8SflXomBQY_08NpvVicNzzmilhBlU4diVMKU/edit?usp=sharing)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
